project.description: Job for cleaning Workspace (on LSF cluster or locally)

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: LSF_CLUSTER
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: Decide whether or not to clean the Boeblingen LSF cluster workspaces.

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: Workspace
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description: The name of the workspace to clean.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash
echo echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "BUILD START (`date`)" echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "EXECUTING WORKSPACE CLEANING SHELL FROM MOPJENKINS ..." echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "Hostname: `hostname`"; echo "ID: `id`" echo "Working dir is : $PWD" echo
set +x
#============================================================================================== # Variables
EmailDestinationList=( fabrice_moyen@fr.ibm.com ) EmailOrNotEmail=0 # 0 means do not send emails; 1 means send email
HWUser="capimop"
# Example: RootJobName= SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix RootJobName=`echo $JOB_NAME | awk -F"/" '{print $1}'` # $JOB_NAME-> Jenkins global variable
# Example: LocalWorkspace= /var/jenkins/workspace/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix@2/master/ACT/hdl_example.NORAM/CRD_CL/AD9H3_nCL/label/X86_UBUNTU LocalWorkspace=$WORKSPACE # $WORKSPACE-> Jenkins global variable
# Example: WorkspaceName= SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix@2 (@2 used if one build is running when starting a 2nd build) WorkspaceName=`echo $LocalWorkspace | sed "s%^.*$RootJobName%$RootJobName%" | cut -d"/" -f1`
# Example: LocalRootWorkspace= /var/jenkins/workspace/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix@2 LocalRootWorkspace="`echo $LocalWorkspace | awk -F"/$WorkspaceName/" '{print $1}'`/$WorkspaceName"
LSFRoot="/afs/bb/proj/fpga"
# Example: LSFRootWorkspace= /afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix (@2 name is not planned in $LSFRoot/framework/CI_ws) LSFRootWorkspace="$LSFRoot/framework/CI_ws/$RootJobName"
# Example: LSFWorkspace= /afs/bb/proj/fpga/framework/CI_ws/SNAP_IMG_CAPI2_matrix/master/ACT/hdl_example.NORAM/CRD_CL/AD9H3_nCL/label/X86_UBUNTU LSFWorkspace="$LSFRootWorkspace/`echo $LocalWorkspace | awk -F"$LocalRootWorkspace/" '{print $2}'`"
# LSFLoginServer, RootWorkspace variables... or RootWorkspace pointing to local dir if [ "$LSF_CLUSTER" == "true" ]; then echo;echo "****************************************************************************************" echo "J:LSF Login Server SETUP ..."
# Boeblingen LSF cluster Login Servers LSFLoginServersList="\ hdcl050.boeblingen.de.ibm.com hdcl051.boeblingen.de.ibm.com hdcl052.boeblingen.de.ibm.com hdcl027.boeblingen.de.ibm.com hdcl060.boeblingen.de.ibm.com hdclp026.boeblingen.de.ibm.com"
LSFLoginServer="" for i in $LSFLoginServersList; do if ping -c1 $i >/dev/null 2>&1; then LSFLoginServer=$i break fi done
if [[ "$LSFLoginServer" != "" ]]; then echo " -> LSF Login Server = $LSFLoginServer" echo " -> LSF Root workspace = $LSFRootWorkspace" else echo " -> no LSF Login Server available ! Exiting" exit 1 fi
fi
echo "LocalWorkspace= $LocalWorkspace" echo "LSFWorkspace= $LSFWorkspace" echo "LSFLoginServer= $LSFLoginServer"
exit 0
if [ "$LSF_CLUSTER" == "true" ]; then # First time calling ssh, "StrictHostKeyChecking no" updates .ssh/known_hosts file without asking WorkspaceDirList=`sshpass -p $AFSPass ssh -o "StrictHostKeyChecking no" $AFSUser@$LSFLoginServer "ls -d $LSFRootWorkspace/*/"` else WorkspaceDirList=`ls -d $LocalRootWorkspace/*/` fi
